skill_constraints: Severe bottleneck on single backend developer for first 2 sprints; overloaded frontend team.
mitigation_strategies: Delay 'Should Have' and 'Could Have' features. Aggressively prioritize critical path.

scenario_name: Augmented Team - Recommended (5 Members from S2)
skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for new backend developer in Sprint 2.
resource_bottlenecks: Frontend capacity for parallel Web/Mobile work remains a constraint.
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming for new backend developer to accelerate ramp-up. Prioritize backend-heavy tasks in early sprints.
